alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 10:42PM CDT until June 02 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Chikaskia River near Corbin affecting Sumner County. For the Chikaskia River...including Corbin...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chikaskia River near Corbin. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying areas can be expected, especially along the right bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.0 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Chikaskia River Corbin 10.0 10.0 Wed 10 pm CD 5.2 3.6 3.5 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
